methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.task_user
params.description: The UNIX user ID on the worker VM to use for tasks launched by taskrunner; e.g. "root".

params.name: data.task_group
params.description: The UNIX group ID on the worker VM to use for tasks launched by taskrunner; e.g. "wheel".

params.name: data.oauth_scopes
params.description: The OAuth2 scopes to be requested by the taskrunner in order to access the Cloud Dataflow API.

params.name: data.base_url
params.description: The base URL for the taskrunner to use when accessing Google Cloud APIs. When workers access Google Cloud APIs, they logically do so via relative URLs. If this field is specified, it supplies the base URL to use for resolving these relative URLs. The normative algorithm used is defined by RFC 1808, "Relative Uniform Resource Locators". If not specified, the default value is "http://www.googleapis.com/"

params.name: data.dataflow_api_version
params.description: The API version of endpoint, e.g. "v1b3"

params.name: data.parallel_worker_settings
params.description: The settings to pass to the parallel worker harness.

params.name: data.base_task_dir
params.description: The location on the worker for task-specific subdirectories.

params.name: data.continue_on_exception
params.description: Whether to continue taskrunner if an exception is hit.

params.name: data.log_to_serialconsole
params.description: Whether to send taskrunner log info to Google Compute Engine VM serial console.

params.name: data.alsologtostderr
params.description: Whether to also send taskrunner log info to stderr.

params.name: data.log_upload_location
params.description: Indicates where to put logs. If this is not specified, the logs will not be uploaded. The supported resource type is: Google Cloud Storage: storage.googleapis.com/{bucket}/{object} bucket.storage.googleapis.com/{object}

params.name: data.log_dir
params.description: The directory on the VM to store logs.

params.name: data.temp_storage_prefix
params.description: The prefix of the resources the taskrunner should use for temporary storage. The supported resource type is: Google Cloud Storage: storage.googleapis.com/{bucket}/{object} bucket.storage.googleapis.com/{object}

params.name: data.harness_command
params.description: The command to launch the worker harness.

params.name: data.workflow_file_name
params.description: The file to store the workflow in.

params.name: data.commandlines_file_name
params.description: The file to store preprocessing commands in.

params.name: data.vm_id
params.description: The ID string of the VM.

params.name: data.language_hint
params.description: The suggested backend language.

params.name: data.streaming_worker_main_class
params.description: The streaming worker main class name.

methods.name: getBaseUrl
methods.description:
The base URL for the taskrunner to use when accessing Google Cloud APIs.

When workers access Google Cloud APIs, they logically do so via relative URLs. If this field is specified, it supplies the base URL to use for resolving these relative URLs. The normative algorithm used is defined by RFC 1808, "Relative Uniform Resource Locators". If not specified, the default value is "http://www.googleapis.com/"

Generated from protobuf field string base_url = 4;

methods.name: setBaseUrl
methods.description:
The base URL for the taskrunner to use when accessing Google Cloud APIs.

When workers access Google Cloud APIs, they logically do so via relative URLs. If this field is specified, it supplies the base URL to use for resolving these relative URLs. The normative algorithm used is defined by RFC 1808, "Relative Uniform Resource Locators". If not specified, the default value is "http://www.googleapis.com/"

Generated from protobuf field string base_url = 4;
